Sentencas: Joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) to stainless steels is considered for various applications such as solid oxide fuel cells, thermal barrier coatings, and medical implants.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: In the present work, a series of brazing pastes utilizing silver and nickel nanoparticles (similar to 80 nm) mixed with carboxymethyl cellulose as the organic phase were developed to join 5 mol% YSZ to AISI 420 steel.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Effects of processing parameters including time and temperature of brazing and the composition of the nanopastes on the microstructure of joints and their shear rupture strength were studied.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Elaboration of the joining mechanism by scanning electron microscopy and electron probe micro-analyzer showed solid-state sintering of the nanoparticles.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Limited diffusion of the elements in the 420 SS part caused interface formation with a spongy structure.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Increasing of the paste solid loading increased the density of the spongy structure at the interface region; thereby higher mechanical strength was attained.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: The joining was more successful when a silver nanopaste was utilized owing to the higher sintering activity of silver nanoparticles compared to nickel at relatively low brazing temperatures.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Meanwhile, at high solid loadings, localized nanoparticle aggregation and microstructural heterogeneity at the interface region were observed.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Increasing of the brazing time and temperature enhanced the diffusion of elements and improved the joint strength.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Sentencas: Optimization of the processing parameters by the L16 Taguchi method determined that a silver paste with 72% solid loading processed at 270 degrees C for 120 min would yield a sound joint with shear strength of 23 +/- 1 MPa.
Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels
Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels

Titulo: Development of composite silver/nickel nanopastes for low temperature joining of yttria-stabilized zirconia to stainless steels
